articles.title: Under fire over inflation, Biden nods to Fed and attacks Republicans - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden, under pressure to tame high inflation, sought to assure Americans on Tuesday that he understands what they are grappling with and that the Federal Reserve is working to resolve the top issue weighing on his administration.
articles.content: WASHINGTON, May 10 (Reuters) - U.S. President Joe Biden, under pressure to tame high inflation, sought to assure Americans on Tuesday that he understands what they are grappling with and that the Fed… [+3762 chars]
